attributes.action: Force makers of television commercials to not increase the sound and to ensure it remains at the level set by the person watching
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Makers of TV Commercials disturb the peace by increasing the volume above that set by the user.  This is annoying and disturbs the peace

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
